title: Punch
overview: A tragic union of a man and a woman in a world where fist comes before the law, they choose love before fist to find hope in their future... Punch! Yoo Bin looses her only family, her brother, Yoo Chul, from a boxing match, and is left alone in the world. She lives a difficult life but an opportunity to become a female boxer makes her a grown women. Boxer by day and nightclub solicitor by night. But, Han Sae is a very fast and skilled fighter. Even when Han Sae knows that Yoo Bin is Yoo Chul's sister, he is attracted to her by her fresh image.
